{"id":1186812645,"question_id":3325,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1708958916,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1186812645/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Largest Area of Square Inside Two Rectangles","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    using ll = long long;\n    using pii = pair<int, int>;\n    using vi = vector<int>;\n    \n    long long common(vi& bL0, vi& tR0, vi& bL1, vi& tR1){\n        if(bL0[0] > tR1[0] || bL1[0] > tR0[0] || bL0[1] > tR1[1] || bL1[1] > tR0[1]) return 0;\n        ll ans = 0;\n        int x, y;\n        if(tR0[0] < tR1[0]) x = tR0[0] - bL1[0];\n        else x = tR1[0] - tR0[0];\n        if(tR0[1] < tR1[1]) y = tR0[1] - bL1[1];\n        else y = tR1[1] - tR0[1];\n        ans = min(x, y);\n        return ans;\n    }\n    \n    long long largestSquareArea(vector<vector<int>>& bottomLeft, vector<vector<int>>& topRight) {\n        int n = bottomLeft.size();\n        vector<vector<int>> rect;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n; i++){\n            rect.push_back({bottomLeft[i][0], bottomLeft[i][1], topRight[i][0], topRight[i][1]});\n        }\n        sort(rect.begin(), rect.end(), \n            [](vector<int> a, vector<int> b){\n                return a < b;\n            }\n        );\n        \n        ll ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++){\n            for(int j = i + 1; j < n; j++){\n                vector<int> bL0{rect[i][0], rect[i][1]}, bL1{rect[j][0], rect[j][1]};\n                vector<int> tR0{rect[i][2], rect[i][3]}, tR1{rect[j][2], rect[j][3]};\n                ll c = common(bL0, tR0, bL1, tR1);\n                ans = max(ans, c*c);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-largest-area-of-square-inside-two-rectangles","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
